criteria.description: Estimates combined travel, lodging, meals, and activity expenses
criteria.name: Total Trip Cost

criteria.description: Time and ease of reaching the destination, including flights and transfers
criteria.name: Travel Time/Convenience

criteria.description: Probability of favorable weather conditions during fall break
criteria.name: Weather Reliability

criteria.description: Overall safety, crime rates, and current travel advisories
criteria.name: Safety/Reputation

criteria.description: Range and quality of leisure and adventure activities
criteria.name: Available Activities

criteria.description: Availability and standard of lodging options
criteria.name: Accommodation Quality

criteria.description: Opportunities for local culture, cuisine, and immersion
criteria.name: Cultural Experience

criteria.description: Degree to which the destination meets group interests and preferences
criteria.name: Group Preference Alignment

options.description: Island beaches, volcanic landscapes, and diverse activities
options.name: Hawaii

options.name: Caribbean (e.g., Jamaica)

options.description: Resorts, nightlife, Mayan ruins, and coastal activities

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not important) to 5 (very important), how important is minimizing the total trip cost?
On a scale of 1 (not important) to 5 (very important), how crucial is minimizing travel time and transfers?

questions.criteria_link: Weather Reliability, Cultural Experience, Accommodation Quality
questions.text: Please rank the following factors in order of importance for your enjoyment, where 1 is most important: Weather Reliability, Cultural Experience, Accommodation Quality.
On a scale of 1 (not appealing) to 5 (very appealing), how appealing are the available activities (e.g., beaches, water sports, excursions)?
Would you exclude any destination with a high safety risk or a current travel advisory?
What specific preferences or priorities do you and your friends have for this trip?

scenario_text.scenario: My friends and I want to go on vacation to somewhere tropical this fall break

title: Selecting a Tropical Fall Break Vacation Destination
